features: [ENHANCE YOUR GOLF GAME] - The Wingman View is a golf bluetooth speaker that provides audible front, center, and back distances for up to 10 hours of battery life with a viewable LCD screen that provides distance and music information.

[STAY CONNECTED] - With Bluetooth compatibility, the Wingman View golf cart speaker can also connect to your smartphone, allowing you to receive texts, calls, and control your music, all while keeping your phone safely in your bag or pocket.

[ENJOY MUSIC ON THE COURSE] - Bushnell's golf cart speakers bluetooth devices also feature high-quality audio with 10 hours of battery life, allowing you to listen to your favorite music, podcasts, and audiobooks while you play.

[EASY TO USE] - This Bushnell golf speaker has a simple button layout and voice confirmation, making it easy to use even while you're in the middle of your round. Plus, it comes with a built-in clip for easy attachment to your golf bag or cart.
[BUSHNELL WINGMAN VIEW BUNDLE] - Bushnell Wingman View GPS Speaker, Remote, USB Charging Cable, and PlayBetter Protective Neoprene Pouch with Clip

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bushnell Wingman View Golf GPS Speaker The Wingman View offers the convenience of listening to your favorite music while receiving both visual and audible distance measurements throughout the course. With high-quality audio and an LCD screen displaying both distance and music information, this device is a must-have for any golfer.

HIT THE BUTTON FOR AUDIBLE FRONT, CENTER, BACK OF GREEN CALL-OUTS Easily obtain audible distance measurements from over 36,000 courses worldwide with the Wingman View by pressing a button on the remote. AUDIBLE 1ST TEE INTRODUCTIONS & CUSTOM SOUND BITES Access audible 1st tee introductions & custom sound bites easily by clicking the Bushnell button located on the remote. VIEW HAZARD DISTANCES The Wingman View provides up to six hazard distances per hole that are both audible & visible on its LCD screen.

INTEGRATED BITE MAGNETIC CART MOUNT The Wingman View boasts Bushnell's signature BITE magnetic mount, which simplifies the process of attaching the device directly to the cart bar. REMOVEABLE BITE REMOTE With the newly redesigned Wingman View remote, you can obtain GPS distances, modify volume levels, change songs, & play sound clips & first-tee introductions. NEW BUSHNELL GOLF APP The Bushnell Golf app offers supplementary advantages, data, & insights to assist in enhancing your golf game. The app also allows for easy updating of your GPS device (applicable to 2021 GPS products & beyond).
PlayBetter Protective Carrying Pouch Throw your Wingman in our PlayBetter Protective Neoprene Pouch after rounds to ensure it doesn't get scuffed up in your bag or car!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Add for your Golf Outing
reviews.reviewText: Saw this come up in an add and decided to go for it. I typically use a rangefinder for exact measurements, but I really enjoy the ease of use with the Wingman. I just got it and used at my country club, which was good to know they had that course. The magnet to secure to the cart is awesome....very strong, no worries it will come off cart. It has a great sound with decent bass tones to play your tunes, and when you want to quickly check distance to center, simply press the remote control button and it will call out distance to center of green, as well as distance to any water hazards. I am sure it can do more, but I am the typical guy who just wants to link it up and go. The app was easy to load, and there is no cost associated with the app (at least as far as I can tell now). If you are looking for a nice cart speaker with a GPS feature, look no further. This unit is very cool, and very reasonably priced. Simple functions (on/off, volume) make this practical, simple to use and just a fun go to. I will use this all the time now, but remember to take it off the cart when you are done! I actually left mine ono the cart and realized I left it there when I was making a quick call to the wife when leaving the club. My audio was still connected to the Wingman, so I ran back and grabbed it. Much like cigar holders, it could be easy to forget.....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars durable, sounds great!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift, he was so excited! It’s very well-made. I got the speaker and a case for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband loves this!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband, who goes golfing frequently. He loves this product and will not leave without it. It is very accurate in its measurement, great for playing music or audio books, and is very secure in the cart while driving. It does not slip or fall at all. I would highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sound and Accurate distances
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this is a phenomenal Speaker and Range-Finder for a mediocre fast-past golfer.I am a Bogey golfer and love to play and keep track of my scores, the app is great and helps me better keep track of my rounds and how I play each hole. It compiles my states from all of the rounds I enter and gives me all kinds of data about my performance like my par percentage when my tee shots lands in the fairway vs. when I'm in the left or right rough. It also tracks my 2-putts and where my scores tend to fall when I 1, 2 or 3 putt.The range finder gives me accurate distances to the center of the green (+/- 5 yards) which is tight enough for my golf skills and it is fast so I can press the range button and it gives me my range as I'm picking my club which helps increase the speed of play. I still use my handheld range finder for shots onto the green so I know my distance to the flag and to cover the front edge of the green.I use this speaker/range finder every round, just like my golf shoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I received this for my birthday from my family. I was really excited about this. It is loud, and pretty accurate as far as announcing yardage. The only 1 1/2 negatives that I have:- Sound is very trebley with little bass- Even though it has a strong magnet on it, I still strap it down because depending on who is driving the cart, and what you are driving through, it could bounce off. This really is a suggestion opposed to a negative. The magnet is pretty strong.I would give it 4 1/2 stars just because of the low bass. I would absolutely recommend this speaker for golf though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the product
reviews.reviewText: Strong magnet and easy to use .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like a $150-quality speaker with bonus golf function
reviews.reviewText: Sound quality in this thing is amazing. Absolutely incredible. Bass is outstanding and the clarity is better than any bluetooth speaker I've ever heard. This would be well worth the $150 if you just wanted a high end speaker. The range finder is almost like a bonus. However, that bonus works really well. I read some reviews that had complaints, but mine has been superb. Really nice to push a button and instantly get distances of green edges, the pin, and hazards.On the other hand, the neoprene bag is not worth $10. If I did it again I would just get the speaker and maybe look for one of the hard shell cases that are like $15. The bag is not designed for the speaker, it just happens to fit. It's adequate quality-wise but does not do justice to such a high-end speaker. I bet with a little digging one could find a great case for cheap, but the bag in this deal is not the answer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The speaker/GPS works great! The only downside to it is if it’s dead, you’re not likely to have it on the course. Make sure it’s charged the night before your round. Even with USB in the cart, there wasn’t enough amps or bolts to charge it.
